nodes.text: The Bestal system was a system in the Varada sector, located in the Outer Rim region of the galaxy. It contained the planet Bestal Three and the Kadal Asteroid Field among others. Tyanna Tymb purchased the resource and trade rights to this system for the SoroSuub Corporation in 4 ABY, but found that Fax Ventures already owned Bestal Three and the Kadal Asteroid Field.
